ranged_weapons.name: NIL grenade launcher, merc
ranged_weapons.description: NIL (an acronym for “neutronic individual launcher”) grenade launchers are the most common grenade launcher available on the market. NILs can be fitted with any sort of grenade as ammunition. Grenades are loaded individually, rather than in magazines. You can load different types of grenades into a NIL grenade launcher, and you can select which grenade to fire as part of the action used to make an attack.

ranged_weapons.name: IMDS missile launcher
ranged_weapons.description: IMDS (an acronym for “individual missile delivery system”) missile launchers are the most common missile launchers currently on the market. IMDS launchers fire individual missiles as ammunition and use the damage listed for the missiles fired out of them.

ranged_weapons.name: Smoke grenade
ranged_weapons.description: A smoke grenade deals no damage; instead, it releases a cloud of dense smoke. Each character who inhales smoke must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw each round (DC = 15 + 1 per previous check) or spend that round choking and coughing; he can do nothing else. A character who chokes for 2 consecutive rounds takes 1d6 nonlethal damage. (Active environmental protection from a suit of armor prevents this effect altogether.) Regardless of the armor a character wears, smoke obscures vision, granting concealment to anyone within it.

ranged_weapons.name: Carbonedge shuriken (10)
ranged_weapons.description: The four-armed kasathas favor thrown weapons, so they are the most common users of these finely edged projectiles. Users of thrown weapons appreciate the light weight and keen edges of carbonedge shuriken.

ranged_weapons.name: Nyfiber net
ranged_weapons.description: Created from specialized nylon fibers that contract in response to struggle, nyfiber nets are weighted along the edges to more effectively entangle their targets.

ranged_weapons.name: Bow
ranged_weapons.description: Modern compound bows are made of aluminum alloys, for superior lightness and durability. The string is made of highperformance polyethylene. Bows fire arrows as ammunition, and they can also be used with grenade arrows for more customized damage and effects.
